title: Fr. Kenneth Tanner | From Word of Faith to Ancient Faith | What Changed His View on Christianity?
description: Fr. Kenneth Tanner shares about a pivotal moment in his spiritual journey which led him to explore what he considers to be a more rich, historic version of the Christian faith then what he knew as young student at Oral Roberts University (at the time, a prominent "Word of Faith" college in Tulsa, Oklahoma).
